0110110100011001 1101110010100101 0 -> sum: 0100100110111110, cout: 1

1100101101010000 0011110110100011 1 -> sum: 0000100011110100, cout: 1
0011100110110000 1100011110101100 0 -> sum: 0000000101011100, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
